teaching you this book. So try not to just read it
on the surface, put yourself in it, put yourself

though we're never gonna understand it

<text text-anchor="start" x="43" y="-2795.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Okay. So, yesterday [crosstalk 00:00:47] when</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="53" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> We looked at the book and saw there are no</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="38.5" y="-2705.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and why you thought that would be a great title</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="137" y="-2690.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> for the first chapter.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="25,-2812.5 25,-2812.5 400,-2812.5 400,-2812.5 25,-2812.5"/>

<text text-anchor="start" x="1653" y="-2122.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I put "A Different Side of The Story", because</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="1639.5" y="-2077.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and the reason why everything was going bad. So</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="1641" y="-2062.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> then once we started to hear his side of the story</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="8636" y="-2335.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> because when Moshe was warning people that the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="8641.5" y="-2320.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Gestapo were in the woods killing people, no one</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="8657" y="-2305.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> believes him and they say that he just wants</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="8647.5" y="-2290.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> pity; but then not long after the German troops</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="8661.5" y="-2275.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> move into their town and they start getting</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="8782.5" y="-2260.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> deported.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="8629,-2367.5 8629,-2367.5 9010,-2367.5 9010,-2367.5 8629,-2367.5"/>

<text text-anchor="start" x="10485" y="-2780.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Non-fiction? Okay and when you worked on</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="10492" y="-2765.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> non-fiction, what it the importance of this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="10481.5" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> work being a work of fiction? What were the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="10490.5" y="-2735.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> people that were talking about non-fiction</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="10469" y="-2720.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> yesterday, what were the sort of things that you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="10624.5" y="-2705.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> had?</text>

<title>32</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="9823,-2865.5 9823,-2892.5 10207,-2892.5 10207,-2865.5 9823,-2865.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9936.5" y="-2875.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 32 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="9823,-2628.5 9823,-2865.5 10207,-2865.5 10207,-2628.5 9823,-2628.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9856.5" y="-2848.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> So you see the different people in a state of</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9870.5" y="-2833.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> disbelief. Yeah, I love all these different</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9854" y="-2818.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> titles, you guys really captured a lot of what</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9863" y="-2803.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> was in that first section. So, I think that's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9855.5" y="-2788.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> really an interesting thing to think about as</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9854" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> you go through this text. Each chapter, they</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9829" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> don't have a name, but as you read, to sort of some</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9865.5" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> up in your mind, what is the focus of this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9864.5" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> chapter? And you really got a lot of great</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9857" y="-2713.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> information out there. So when you worked</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9859.5" y="-2698.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> yesterday, in your small groups, this is our</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9870.5" y="-2683.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> first discussion on Night. So let's talk a</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9866.5" y="-2668.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> little bit about how we're discussing this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9838.5" y="-2653.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> book. What was the genre that we were using to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="9942" y="-2638.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> describe this work?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="9822,-2865.5 9822,-2865.5 10208,-2865.5 10208,-2865.5 9822,-2865.5"/>

<text text-anchor="start" x="9440" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Yeah and it ends with- the chapter ends, right?</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="11786" y="-2807.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 35 - STUDENT 4</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11852" y="-2792.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="11697,-2695.5 11697,-2782.5 12046,-2782.5 12046,-2695.5 11697,-2695.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11703" y="-2765.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> We said that why Elie Wiesel using non-fiction</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11734.5" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> for Night it helped people realize and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11714.5" y="-2735.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> understand what actually went on and how</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11721" y="-2720.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> horrific it is and trying to prevent it from</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11807.5" y="-2705.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> happening again.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="11696,-2782.5 11696,-2782.5 12047,-2782.5 12047,-2782.5 11696,-2782.5"/>

<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="11886,-2360.5 11886,-2402.5 12258,-2402.5 12258,-2360.5 11886,-2360.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11982" y="-2385.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 37 - STUDENT 27</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12024.5" y="-2370.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="11886,-2258.5 11886,-2360.5 12258,-2360.5 12258,-2258.5 11886,-2258.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11904.5" y="-2343.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Our group, we had non-fiction versus fictional</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11918.5" y="-2328.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and for it being non-fiction it was realistic</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11911" y="-2313.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and you could actually relate to him and the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11900.5" y="-2298.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> other Jewish people because it was events that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11892" y="-2283.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> actually happened and occurred and happened to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12049" y="-2268.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> them.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="11885,-2360.5 11885,-2360.5 12259,-2360.5 12259,-2360.5 11885,-2360.5"/>

<title>38</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="11890,-2133 11890,-2175 12255,-2175 12255,-2133 11890,-2133"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11982.5" y="-2157.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 38 - STUDENT 11</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12025" y="-2142.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="11890,-2031 11890,-2133 12255,-2133 12255,-2031 11890,-2031"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11898" y="-2115.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> When it's fiction and you know it's made up you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11896" y="-2100.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> tend to read and just kind of overlook it because</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11905.5" y="-2085.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> you know it's not real, but when you know it's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11917.5" y="-2070.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> non-fiction you, kind of, put yourself in the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11910" y="-2055.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> characters shoes and see what they're going</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12039" y="-2040.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> through.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="11889,-2133 11889,-2133 12256,-2133 12256,-2133 11889,-2133"/>

<g id="node74" class="node">
<title>40</title>
<polygon fill="#ffffff" stroke="transparent" points="11492,-2345.5 11492,-2387.5 11850,-2387.5 11850,-2345.5 11492,-2345.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11581" y="-2370.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 40 - STUDENT 13</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11644" y="-2355.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">AGREE</text>
<polygon fill="#ffffff" stroke="transparent" points="11492,-2273.5 11492,-2345.5 11850,-2345.5 11850,-2273.5 11492,-2273.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11519" y="-2328.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I would say that Elie Wiesel's purpose for</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11504" y="-2313.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> writing Night is to inform readers about what</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11498" y="-2298.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> happened during the events of the holocaust so</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11584.5" y="-2283.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> it never happens again.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="11491,-2345.5 11491,-2345.5 11851,-2345.5 11851,-2345.5 11491,-2345.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="11491,-2272.5 11491,-2388.5 11851,-2388.5 11851,-2272.5 11491,-2272.5"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="11581.5" y="-2134.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 41 - STUDENT 20</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11644.5" y="-2119.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">AGREE</text>
<polygon fill="#ffffff" stroke="transparent" points="11498,-2053 11498,-2110 11845,-2110 11845,-2053 11498,-2053"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11506.5" y="-2092.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> And adding to what he said, He also wants to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11504" y="-2077.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> persuade the audience so it would not happen</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11647" y="-2062.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> again.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="11497,-2110 11497,-2110 11846,-2110 11846,-2110 11497,-2110"/>

<title>42</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="12874,-1640.5 12874,-1667.5 13223,-1667.5 13223,-1640.5 12874,-1640.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12970" y="-1650.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 42 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="12874,-1583.5 12874,-1640.5 13223,-1640.5 13223,-1583.5 12874,-1583.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12880" y="-1623.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> To persuade. So, when you were talking about</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12893.5" y="-1608.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> author's pur- okay. So, in addition to being</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12896.5" y="-1593.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> non-fiction, how is this work categorized?</text>

<!-- 39 -->
<g id="node77" class="node">
<title>39</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="12479,-1655.5 12479,-1682.5 12837,-1682.5 12837,-1655.5 12479,-1655.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12579.5" y="-1665.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 39 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="12479,-1568.5 12479,-1655.5 12837,-1655.5 12837,-1568.5 12479,-1568.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12485" y="-1638.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Yeah, I like those responses. So the reason why</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12486" y="-1623.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> it may have been non-fiction. So, what was the,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12489.5" y="-1608.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> when we were thinking about this, what is the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12498.5" y="-1593.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> author's purpose? Do you think having it be</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="12502.5" y="-1578.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> non-fiction is part of the author's purpose?</text>

<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="11481,-1898 11481,-1940 11861,-1940 11861,-1898 11481,-1898"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11581" y="-1922.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 48 - STUDENT 22</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11623.5" y="-1907.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="11481,-1766 11481,-1898 11861,-1898 11861,-1766 11481,-1766"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11487" y="-1880.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> We said it was both a autobiography and a memoir</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11514.5" y="-1865.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> because since the writer of the story is the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11507" y="-1850.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> narrator who was explaining what happened,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11498" y="-1835.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that's what makes it be an autobiography and a</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11496" y="-1820.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> memoir because it's just about a certain time or</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11521" y="-1805.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> it's a historical account so it's describing</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11508.5" y="-1790.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> what happened during the holocaust and it's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="11589" y="-1775.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> from his point of view.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="11480,-1898 11480,-1898 11862,-1898 11862,-1898 11480,-1898"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="11480,-1765 11480,-1941 11862,-1941 11862,-1765 11480,-1765"/>
</g>

<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="15843,-2805.5 15843,-2847.5 16227,-2847.5 16227,-2805.5 15843,-2805.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15949.5" y="-2830.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 51 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16015.5" y="-2815.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="15843,-2673.5 15843,-2805.5 16227,-2805.5 16227,-2673.5 15843,-2673.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15867.5" y="-2788.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think it, kind of, shows that he's just one out</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15858" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> of many who went through this and you can only</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15864.5" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> tell a part of the actual story, because so many</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15895" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> different people had so many different</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15849" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> experiences in the camps and he can only show his</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15866.5" y="-2713.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> point of view, but people went through a lot to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="15857.5" y="-2698.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> help us to learn and make sure it doesn't happen</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16010.5" y="-2683.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> again.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="15842,-2805.5 15842,-2805.5 16228,-2805.5 16228,-2805.5 15842,-2805.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="15842,-2672.5 15842,-2848.5 16228,-2848.5 16228,-2672.5 15842,-2672.5"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="15452" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> So let's talk about Elie, what did we learn about</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="16595" y="-1232.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 67 - STUDENT 27</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16637.5" y="-1217.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="16506,-1120.5 16506,-1207.5 16864,-1207.5 16864,-1120.5 16506,-1120.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16512" y="-1190.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> He doesn't want to make a mistake and ask the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16512" y="-1175.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> wrong questions and offend someone, if that be</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16518" y="-1160.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> his father or anyone in his family. Some of the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16513" y="-1145.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> questions could be "Why are Jews getting their</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16532.5" y="-1130.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> stuff taken, why are they getting taken?".</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="16505,-1207.5 16505,-1207.5 16865,-1207.5 16865,-1207.5 16505,-1207.5"/>

<!-- 69 -->
<g id="node103" class="node">
<title>69</title>
<polygon fill="#3cb371" stroke="transparent" points="16489,-1018 16489,-1060 16882,-1060 16882,-1018 16489,-1018"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16600" y="-1042.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 69 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16635.5" y="-1027.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">CHALLENGE</text>
<polygon fill="#3cb371" stroke="transparent" points="16489,-856 16489,-1018 16882,-1018 16882,-856 16489,-856"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16520" y="-1000.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I don't think it’s necessarily about asking the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16547.5" y="-985.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> wrong questions, but asking the right</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16519" y="-970.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> questions to get the right answers. like that’s</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16526" y="-955.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> what makes it so dramatic. Seeing all these</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16528" y="-940.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> things that he saw, I think he's questioning</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16522" y="-925.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> everything and that includes his religion and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16515.5" y="-910.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> because he doesn't believe and because you're</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16519" y="-895.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> not supposed to question he's struggling with</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16495" y="-880.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that and he wants to ask why but he doesn't want to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16531.5" y="-865.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> go against his religion, go against himself.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="16488,-1018 16488,-1018 16883,-1018 16883,-1018 16488,-1018"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="16487.5,-855 16487.5,-1061 16882.5,-1061 16882.5,-855 16487.5,-855"/>
</g>

<!-- 71 -->
<g id="node104" class="node">
<title>71</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="16495,-767.5 16495,-809.5 16876,-809.5 16876,-767.5 16495,-767.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16595.5" y="-792.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 71 - STUDENT 19</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16638" y="-777.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="16495,-620.5 16495,-767.5 16876,-767.5 16876,-620.5 16495,-620.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16537.5" y="-750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think that it's not unnatural- forgetting</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16517" y="-735.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> about the holocaust like just as a normal teen.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16527.5" y="-720.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Like they question a lot about their life and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16526" y="-705.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> what they've been taught, so I don't believe</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16514" y="-690.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> questioning his god was wrong for him to do, it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16520" y="-675.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> was more natural for him to do, but given the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16527.5" y="-660.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> situation with the holocaust too, I think it's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16501" y="-645.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> even more apparent for him to question the god as</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16668.5" y="-630.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> well</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="16494,-767.5 16494,-767.5 16877,-767.5 16877,-767.5 16494,-767.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="16493.5,-620 16493.5,-811 16876.5,-811 16876.5,-620 16493.5,-620"/>
</g>

<!-- 72 -->
<g id="node105" class="node">
<title>72</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="16501,-532.5 16501,-574.5 16869,-574.5 16869,-532.5 16501,-532.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16599.5" y="-557.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 72 - STUDENT 5</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16637.5" y="-542.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="16501,-415.5 16501,-532.5 16869,-532.5 16869,-415.5 16501,-415.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16523.5" y="-515.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think him questioning his god really shows</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16507" y="-500.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> just how big the holocaust was, I guess. Because</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16518" y="-485.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> he was so religious he didn't want to question</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16527" y="-470.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> anything but once it was happening he was</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16533.5" y="-455.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> questioning it. In the introduction he was</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16522" y="-440.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> almost losing faith because of how terrible it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16674" y="-425.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> is.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="16500,-532.5 16500,-532.5 16870,-532.5 16870,-532.5 16500,-532.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="16500,-415 16500,-576 16870,-576 16870,-415 16500,-415"/>
</g>

<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="16290,-328 16290,-370 16675,-370 16675,-328 16290,-328"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16392.5" y="-352.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 73 - STUDENT 27</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16435" y="-337.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="16290,-226 16290,-328 16675,-328 16675,-226 16290,-226"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16334.5" y="-310.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think he's questioning it all because he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16296" y="-295.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> believes that God would not do him wrong and that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16310" y="-280.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> everything that he's giving is for a purpose and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16308.5" y="-265.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that's what God has sent him through. It's what</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16335" y="-250.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> he's putting him through, but he doesn't</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16311.5" y="-235.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> understand why he's putting him through that.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="16289,-328 16289,-328 16676,-328 16676,-328 16289,-328"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="16288.5,-225 16288.5,-371 16675.5,-371 16675.5,-225 16288.5,-225"/>

<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="16707,-28.5 16707,-130.5 17073,-130.5 17073,-28.5 16707,-28.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16716.5" y="-113.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think when you spend your life living one way,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16736.5" y="-98.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> believing in all the things that you believe</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16713" y="-83.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> since a young age especially for his age when he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16725" y="-68.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> was twelve to fifteen, He definitely questions</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16722" y="-53.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> all his faith that he's learned towards the end,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16741.5" y="-38.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> towards the events that he had endured.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="16706,-130.5 16706,-130.5 17074,-130.5 17074,-130.5 16706,-130.5"/>

<text text-anchor="start" x="16717" y="-310.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I was just going to say, going off of Student 27</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16737" y="-295.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and Student 5, if you puts yourself in the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16724" y="-280.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> situation, it's more understandable why he'd</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16726" y="-265.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> lose belief because he'd been treated poorly</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16724" y="-250.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> for so long, but it was so hard for him to still</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16768" y="-235.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> believe and have faith and hope.</text>

<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="16287,-20.5 16287,-137.5 16671,-137.5 16671,-20.5 16287,-20.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16293" y="-120.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think it was hard for him to even think about how</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16295.5" y="-105.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> his God was, who created him, who created all the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16321" y="-90.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> things, could also create men that could do</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16297" y="-75.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that, throw babies up in the air and shoot them as</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16323" y="-60.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> target practice, to do such horrible things.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16316" y="-45.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Yes, they have free will, but are they using it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="16455" y="-30.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> right?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="16286,-137.5 16286,-137.5 16672,-137.5 16672,-137.5 16286,-137.5"/>

<text text-anchor="start" x="20283.5" y="-2830.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 78 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="20182,-2673.5 20182,-2820.5 20542,-2820.5 20542,-2673.5 20182,-2673.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20192" y="-2803.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I like how you brought up that this is- that you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20188.5" y="-2788.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> brought up the connection to how everyone has</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20188" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> different questions, do you see that in your own</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20202" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> life? Does that make you feel like you relate</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20231.5" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> more to Elie? This idea of what he's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20192.5" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> questioning? What are the things that you feel</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20200.5" y="-2713.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> in this first section that make Elie relatable,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20195" y="-2698.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> in addition to the questions. What else did we</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20298.5" y="-2683.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> learn about Elie?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="20181,-2820.5 20181,-2820.5 20543,-2820.5 20543,-2820.5 20181,-2820.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="20181,-2672.5 20181,-2848.5 20543,-2848.5 20543,-2672.5 20181,-2672.5"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="19805.5" y="-2765.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Don't be afraid guys to also ask one another</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="19479" y="-2792.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 70 - TEACHER</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="19371" y="-2765.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> What do you guys think about that? You know from</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19379" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> the introduction and maybe a couple moments in</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="19421.5" y="-2720.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Any thoughts on that? Any thoughts?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="19364,-2782.5 19364,-2782.5 19751,-2782.5 19751,-2782.5 19364,-2782.5"/>

<text text-anchor="start" x="19073.5" y="-2815.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 68 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="18976,-2688.5 18976,-2805.5 19328,-2805.5 19328,-2688.5 18976,-2688.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18988.5" y="-2788.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Okay, I think that's some questions that may</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18982" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> come up later, right? And those are the kind of</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19019" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> questions that this book asks, so it's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18983.5" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> interesting in this section how you brought up</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18988.5" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that in this beginning section we learn about</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="18988.5" y="-2713.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> how questioning might be important to us as</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="19132.5" y="-2698.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> well.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="18975,-2805.5 18975,-2805.5 19329,-2805.5 19329,-2805.5 18975,-2805.5"/>

<!-- 79 -->
<g id="node115" class="node">
<title>79</title>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="21067,-2790.5 21067,-2832.5 21450,-2832.5 21450,-2790.5 21067,-2790.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21173" y="-2815.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 79 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21239" y="-2800.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="21067,-2688.5 21067,-2790.5 21450,-2790.5 21450,-2688.5 21067,-2688.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21075.5" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I don't know how much we can relate to Elie and I</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21084" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> don't know if that's what we should do, because</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21073" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> by watching him and seeing what he goes through,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21083.5" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think that's what the author's purpose was. So</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21089" y="-2713.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> we don't relate, so we don't have to relate. It’s</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21155" y="-2698.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> so we know what happened.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="21066,-2790.5 21066,-2790.5 21451,-2790.5 21451,-2790.5 21066,-2790.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="21065.5,-2687.5 21065.5,-2833.5 21450.5,-2833.5 21450.5,-2687.5 21065.5,-2687.5"/>
</g>

<!-- 81 -->
<g id="node116" class="node">
<title>81</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="21067,-2367.5 21067,-2409.5 21449,-2409.5 21449,-2367.5 21067,-2367.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21172.5" y="-2392.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 81 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21210.5" y="-2377.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="21067,-2250.5 21067,-2367.5 21449,-2367.5 21449,-2250.5 21067,-2250.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21088" y="-2350.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I don't think we can relate, I don't think it was</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21085.5" y="-2335.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> the purpose of Elie the author to have us relate</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21093.5" y="-2320.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> to it, because I think if we relate to it, it kind</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21082" y="-2305.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> of, it's something we can't do, because we never</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21073" y="-2290.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> had to go through it, we never had to see what has</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21086.5" y="-2275.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> seen, we never had to go through anything like</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21238.5" y="-2260.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that.</text>

<!-- 82 -->

<title>82</title>
<polygon fill="#3cb371" stroke="transparent" points="21294,-2133 21294,-2175 21646,-2175 21646,-2133 21294,-2133"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21380" y="-2157.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 82 - STUDENT 12</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21420" y="-2142.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">CHALLENGE</text>
<polygon fill="#3cb371" stroke="transparent" points="21294,-2031 21294,-2133 21646,-2133 21646,-2031 21294,-2031"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21316.5" y="-2115.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think we can relate to it in a certain way</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21300" y="-2100.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> because of things that have been happening in</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21319.5" y="-2085.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> this world lately like all the shootings, he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21302" y="-2070.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> thinks you can relate back to that with people</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21324" y="-2055.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> being fought for certain beliefs and that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21400" y="-2040.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> stuff, just like him.</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="21399" y="-1877.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 80 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="21318,-1811 21318,-1868 21637,-1868 21637,-1811 21318,-1811"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21325.5" y="-1850.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Anybody disagree with that? Say it again,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21324" y="-1835.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> really loud. Speak loud, everybody! Really</text>

<!-- 86 -->
<g id="node119" class="node">
<title>86</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="20888,-2163 20888,-2205 21258,-2205 21258,-2163 20888,-2163"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20983" y="-2187.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 86 - STUDENT 13</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21025.5" y="-2172.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="20888,-2001 20888,-2163 21258,-2163 21258,-2001 20888,-2001"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20909" y="-2145.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I would say that I think you're right, it's very</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20945" y="-2130.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> hard for us to relate to the specific</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20924" y="-2115.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> experiences that he tries to tell us in the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20910.5" y="-2100.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> course of the book, but I think there is some</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20896" y="-2085.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> aspect that you can relate to, I think he was just</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20900.5" y="-2070.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> crying to get across, there's always going to be</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20894" y="-2055.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> pure evil and pure good in the world, this is what</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20915" y="-2040.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> pure evil can do, I think that's what he was</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20923.5" y="-2025.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> trying to relate to us. Because that's still</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20959" y="-2010.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> everywhere in our world today.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="20887,-2163 20887,-2163 21259,-2163 21259,-2163 20887,-2163"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="20887,-2000 20887,-2206 21259,-2206 21259,-2000 20887,-2000"/>
</g>

<g id="node120" class="node">
<title>89</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="20888,-1890 20888,-1932 21272,-1932 21272,-1890 20888,-1890"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20990" y="-1914.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 89 - STUDENT 27</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="21032.5" y="-1899.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="20888,-1773 20888,-1890 21272,-1890 21272,-1773 20888,-1773"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20894" y="-1872.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Going off what Student 16 and Student 19 said: we</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20919.5" y="-1857.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> can and can't relate to it, we can relate to it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20894" y="-1842.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> because we are all humans and that aspect of good</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20905.5" y="-1827.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and evil, like Duncan said, does happen, and we</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20910.5" y="-1812.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> can relate to it because we're put through this</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20921.5" y="-1797.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> torture and death and disgusting -ness that</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="20965" y="-1782.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> these people were put through.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="20887,-1890 20887,-1890 21273,-1890 21273,-1890 20887,-1890"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="20887,-1772.5 20887,-1933.5 21273,-1933.5 21273,-1772.5 20887,-1772.5"/>
</g>

<!-- 83 -->
<g id="node121" class="node">
<title>83</title>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="22289,-2790.5 22289,-2832.5 22646,-2832.5 22646,-2790.5 22289,-2790.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22377.5" y="-2815.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 83 - STUDENT 11</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22448" y="-2800.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="22289,-2688.5 22289,-2790.5 22646,-2790.5 22646,-2688.5 22289,-2688.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22309.5" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think we should relate to it, because if we</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22307.5" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> don't we just tend to forget about the whole</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22295" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> situation and just throw lies and not even think</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22303.5" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> about it and telling the story of the survivors</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22314" y="-2713.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> then there's a greater chance it's going to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22436.5" y="-2698.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> happen.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="22288,-2790.5 22288,-2790.5 22647,-2790.5 22647,-2790.5 22288,-2790.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="22287.5,-2687.5 22287.5,-2833.5 22646.5,-2833.5 22646.5,-2687.5 22287.5,-2687.5"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="21695" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> How about don't raise your hand, just talk! Just</text>

<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="22721,-2790.5 22721,-2832.5 23076,-2832.5 23076,-2790.5 22721,-2790.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22808.5" y="-2815.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 87 - STUDENT 16</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22879" y="-2800.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="22721,-2688.5 22721,-2790.5 23076,-2790.5 23076,-2688.5 22721,-2688.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22755.5" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Backing up all three of them, I feel like</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22732.5" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> different people, what you've been through in</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22727" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> your life through personal experiences you can</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22731" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> relate to some of this stuff but its never going</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22735.5" y="-2713.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> to be to the certain level that someone like a</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22770.5" y="-2698.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> survivor would be able to relate to.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="22720,-2790.5 22720,-2790.5 23077,-2790.5 23077,-2790.5 22720,-2790.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="22719.5,-2687.5 22719.5,-2833.5 23076.5,-2833.5 23076.5,-2687.5 22719.5,-2687.5"/>
</g>

<!-- 88 -->
<g id="node125" class="node">
<title>88</title>
<polygon fill="#3cb371" stroke="transparent" points="22720,-2345.5 22720,-2387.5 23079,-2387.5 23079,-2345.5 22720,-2345.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22809.5" y="-2370.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 88 - STUDENT 19</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22849.5" y="-2355.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">CHALLENGE</text>
<polygon fill="#3cb371" stroke="transparent" points="22720,-2273.5 22720,-2345.5 23079,-2345.5 23079,-2273.5 22720,-2273.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22735.5" y="-2328.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I don't think it's the fact that we can or can't</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22726" y="-2313.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> relate to it, I think it's more that he needs us to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22729.5" y="-2298.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> relate to it because I don't see him writing it if</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22756" y="-2283.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> he didn't think you couldn't relate to it.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="22719,-2345.5 22719,-2345.5 23080,-2345.5 23080,-2345.5 22719,-2345.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="22718.5,-2272.5 22718.5,-2388.5 23079.5,-2388.5 23079.5,-2272.5 22718.5,-2272.5"/>
</g>

<!-- 91 -->
<g id="node126" class="node">
<title>91</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="22706,-2148 22706,-2190 23094,-2190 23094,-2148 22706,-2148"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22814.5" y="-2172.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 91 - STUDENT 5</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22852.5" y="-2157.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="22706,-2016 22706,-2148 23094,-2148 23094,-2016 22706,-2016"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22735.5" y="-2130.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think we partially can relate, because when</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22721.5" y="-2115.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> this was happening, the author was a similar age</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22745" y="-2100.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> to us and there's still shootings and things</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22740" y="-2085.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> happening that show us all the bad that can</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22725" y="-2070.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> happen and I think that the main purpose of the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22712" y="-2055.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> story is to show us what can happen if we don't pay</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22741" y="-2040.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> attention to the outside world or see what's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22798" y="-2025.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> happening and try to stop...</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="22705,-2148 22705,-2148 23095,-2148 23095,-2148 22705,-2148"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="22705,-2015 22705,-2191 23095,-2191 23095,-2015 22705,-2015"/>
</g>

<!-- 92 -->
<g id="node127" class="node">
<title>92</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="22709,-1913 22709,-1955 23091,-1955 23091,-1913 22709,-1913"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22814.5" y="-1937.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 92 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22852.5" y="-1922.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="22709,-1751 22709,-1913 23091,-1913 23091,-1751 22709,-1751"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22715" y="-1895.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Going back to what Student 5 and Student __ said,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22727.5" y="-1880.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think that if we try to relate we’re minimizing</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22733.5" y="-1865.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> it almost, because there's nothing in our lives</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22726.5" y="-1850.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that we really have seen ourselves or been in in</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22741.5" y="-1835.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> those situations that can be like that. And I</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22742.5" y="-1820.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> think because what Student 5 said "he was</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22748" y="-1805.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> someone our age", I think by showing the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22742" y="-1790.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> difference between our lives and their lives</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22721.5" y="-1775.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and showing that things that happened, they can</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22869" y="-1760.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> happen.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="22708,-1913 22708,-1913 23092,-1913 23092,-1913 22708,-1913"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="22708,-1750 22708,-1956 23092,-1956 23092,-1750 22708,-1750"/>
</g>

<!-- 94 -->
<g id="node128" class="node">
<title>94</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="22712,-1662.5 22712,-1704.5 23088,-1704.5 23088,-1662.5 22712,-1662.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22814.5" y="-1687.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 94 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22852.5" y="-1672.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="22712,-1545.5 22712,-1662.5 23088,-1662.5 23088,-1545.5 22712,-1545.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22774" y="-1645.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think there's a different between</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22752.5" y="-1630.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> relatability back to our lives and putting</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22761.5" y="-1615.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> ourselves in their shoes. I think that's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22718" y="-1600.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> something we all need to do and try to experience</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22768" y="-1585.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> the emotions behind it, but we can't</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22736" y="-1570.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> necessarily connect that to what we're living</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="22732" y="-1555.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> day to day, I mean that's completely different.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="22711,-1662.5 22711,-1662.5 23089,-1662.5 23089,-1662.5 22711,-1662.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="22711,-1545 22711,-1706 23089,-1706 23089,-1545 22711,-1545"/>
</g>

<!-- 90 -->
<g id="node129" class="node">
<title>90</title>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="23567,-2775.5 23567,-2817.5 23934,-2817.5 23934,-2775.5 23567,-2775.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23665" y="-2800.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 90 - STUDENT 8</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="23573" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Going off what Student 19 said, I don't think you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23587.5" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> need to be able to relate to it, I jus think you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23575" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> need to be able to hear it, because its important</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23695.5" y="-2713.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> to learn about.</text>

<!-- 93 -->
<g id="node130" class="node">
<title>93</title>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="23136,-3037.5 23136,-3064.5 23530,-3064.5 23530,-3037.5 23136,-3037.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23254.5" y="-3047.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 93 - TEACHER</text>
<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="23136,-2455.5 23136,-3037.5 23530,-3037.5 23530,-2455.5 23136,-2455.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23156.5" y="-3020.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I see a lot of connection in what you're saying to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23212.5" y="-3005.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> the way we read fiction. We read</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23190" y="-2990.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> fiction..."Yep, that's a story, whatever",</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23160.5" y="-2975.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> but I caution you against reading this that way.</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23154" y="-2960.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I want you to relate, I want you to put yourself in</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23182.5" y="-2945.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Elie's shoes as much as you possibly can;</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23170.5" y="-2930.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> although it is painful for us to do and it's not</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23172.5" y="-2915.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> easy I want you to do that. That is why I am</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23158" y="-2900.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> teaching you this book. So try not to just read it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23167.5" y="-2885.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> on the surface, put yourself in it, put yourself</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23163" y="-2870.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> in the role of Elie. That's what he wants you to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23168" y="-2855.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> do, that's why it's first person! That's why he</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23176.5" y="-2840.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> is the protagonist and the survivor and the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23176.5" y="-2825.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> author- it's all intentional. He wants you to</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23167.5" y="-2810.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> experience it as awful as you possibly can, so</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23142" y="-2795.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that you know how bad it is. So we made a comment</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23174" y="-2780.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> yesterday, "no survivor could begin to tell a</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23162" y="-2765.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> spark of the flame of the story", right? So even</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23186.5" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> though we're never gonna understand it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23170.5" y="-2735.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> completely or be able to put ourselves in the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23168" y="-2720.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> shoes completely, put yourselves in his shoes</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23151.5" y="-2705.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> as much as you possibly can, because if you know</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23154" y="-2690.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> how bad it was and you're feeling these emotions</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23161" y="-2675.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> that Elie makes you feel, then you're not gonna</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23163" y="-2660.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> let something like this happen. Like I told you,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23152" y="-2645.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> you guys are the future, you guys are gonna grow</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23145" y="-2630.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> up and you have to be the ones who don't hate, who</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23170" y="-2615.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> don't discriminate, those of you- you guys all</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23152.5" y="-2600.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> have to be the ones who are accepting of tolerant</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23162" y="-2585.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and teach your friends and your children those</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23170" y="-2570.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> things so that nothing like this ever happens</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23157" y="-2555.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> again. So I caution you from just reading this on</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23172" y="-2540.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> the surface. Read this deeper than any book</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23177" y="-2525.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> you've read and will read this year and put</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23174.5" y="-2510.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> yourself in his shoes, relate as much as you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23185" y="-2495.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> possibly can. Any comments, there? Any</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23172.5" y="-2480.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> questions, there? Do you think it's gonna be</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="23290" y="-2465.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> hard to do?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="23135,-3037.5 23135,-3037.5 23531,-3037.5 23531,-3037.5 23135,-3037.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="23135,-2455 23135,-3066 23531,-3066 23531,-2455 23135,-2455"/>
</g>

<text text-anchor="start" x="26037" y="-2750.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think it's going to be hard with- you need to get</text>

<g id="node132" class="node">
<title>97</title>
<polygon fill="#ffffff" stroke="transparent" points="25635,-2760.5 25635,-2802.5 25996,-2802.5 25996,-2760.5 25635,-2760.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25725.5" y="-2785.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 97 - STUDENT 23</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25796.5" y="-2770.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NON</text>
<polygon fill="#ffffff" stroke="transparent" points="25635,-2718.5 25635,-2760.5 25996,-2760.5 25996,-2718.5 25635,-2718.5"/>

<polygon fill="#ffff00" stroke="transparent" points="25232,-2710.5 25232,-2782.5 25598,-2782.5 25598,-2710.5 25232,-2710.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25257.5" y="-2765.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> What questions do you guys have from this</text>

<text text-anchor="start" x="25246" y="-2735.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> to hear more from you and you talking to each</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="25238" y="-2720.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> other. Student 23, What do you have over there?</text>

<title>98</title>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="26651,-2790.5 26651,-2832.5 27023,-2832.5 27023,-2790.5 26651,-2790.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26751.5" y="-2815.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 98 - STUDENT 9</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26817.5" y="-2800.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">NEW</text>
<polygon fill="#ff6347" stroke="transparent" points="26651,-2688.5 26651,-2790.5 27023,-2790.5 27023,-2688.5 26651,-2688.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26677" y="-2773.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I don't think if you survived the holocaust, I</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26670" y="-2758.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> think you still died, because you had to watch</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26660.5" y="-2743.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> other people die, you had to watch everyone you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26657" y="-2728.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> know die, you had to live there and go through it,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26664.5" y="-2713.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I don't think anyone would ever [be the same] I</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26687" y="-2698.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> don't think [the world would be the same</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="26650,-2790.5 26650,-2790.5 27024,-2790.5 27024,-2790.5 26650,-2790.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="26650,-2687.5 26650,-2833.5 27024,-2833.5 27024,-2687.5 26650,-2687.5"/>

<!-- 99 -->

<title>99</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="26658,-2352.5 26658,-2394.5 27016,-2394.5 27016,-2352.5 26658,-2352.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26747" y="-2377.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 99 - STUDENT 16</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26789.5" y="-2362.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="26658,-2265.5 26658,-2352.5 27016,-2352.5 27016,-2265.5 26658,-2265.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26670" y="-2335.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Backing up Student 9, In this story Elie had a</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26670" y="-2320.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> very strong religion and he was very religious</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26664" y="-2305.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> and he changed. He stopped believing, so I feel</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26671.5" y="-2290.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> like we'd want to be the same but in reality it</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26752.5" y="-2275.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> would change all of us.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="26657,-2352.5 26657,-2352.5 27017,-2352.5 27017,-2352.5 26657,-2352.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="26657,-2265 26657,-2396 27017,-2396 27017,-2265 26657,-2265"/>
</g>

<!-- 100 -->
<g id="node136" class="node">
<title>100</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="26656,-2133 26656,-2175 27019,-2175 27019,-2133 26656,-2133"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26747.5" y="-2157.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 100 - STUDENT 6</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26790" y="-2142.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="26656,-2031 26656,-2133 27019,-2133 27019,-2031 26656,-2031"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26662" y="-2115.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think, going on with what they said, the theme</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26678" y="-2100.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> to struggle to maintain faith, it wouldn't be-</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26678" y="-2085.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> if you were going through what Elie did you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26680.5" y="-2070.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> wouldn't be able to maintain your faith and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26681" y="-2055.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> stability to go through the whole thing and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26716" y="-2040.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> actually be the same coming out.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="26655,-2133 26655,-2133 27020,-2133 27020,-2133 26655,-2133"/>

<!-- 101 -->

<title>101</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="26869,-1913 26869,-1955 27251,-1955 27251,-1913 26869,-1913"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26970" y="-1937.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 101 - STUDENT 5</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="27012.5" y="-1922.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="26869,-1751 26869,-1913 27251,-1913 27251,-1751 26869,-1751"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26901" y="-1895.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I think with an event like the holocaust, it's</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26899" y="-1880.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> impossible to be the same person because if</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26882.5" y="-1865.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> you're going through it you almost have to adapt</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26895.5" y="-1850.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> to the conditions, you can't have a lot of time</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26880.5" y="-1835.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> for fun if they make you do work all the time or if</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26875" y="-1820.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> you don't have as much to eat and do anything you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26894" y="-1805.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> want to, because just from working there you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26904.5" y="-1790.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> would have to change your lifestyle which,</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26912" y="-1775.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> after that [inaudible 00:28:46] normal or</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26982.5" y="-1760.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> accepted, you know?</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="26868,-1913 26868,-1913 27252,-1913 27252,-1913 26868,-1913"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="26868,-1750 26868,-1956 27252,-1956 27252,-1750 26868,-1750"/>
</g>

<!-- 102 -->
<g id="node138" class="node">
<title>102</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="26461,-1875 26461,-1917 26833,-1917 26833,-1875 26461,-1875"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26552.5" y="-1899.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 102 - STUDENT 18</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26599.5" y="-1884.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="26461,-1788 26461,-1875 26833,-1875 26833,-1788 26461,-1788"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26496.5" y="-1857.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> I agree, but I think that if I went through</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26475.5" y="-1842.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> something like the holocaust I would not really</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26472" y="-1827.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> give up my religion, I think it would be stronger</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26467" y="-1812.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> because I would rely on it to help me get through</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26597" y="-1797.8" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> the situation.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="26460,-1875 26460,-1875 26834,-1875 26834,-1875 26460,-1875"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="26460,-1787.5 26460,-1918.5 26834,-1918.5 26834,-1787.5 26460,-1787.5"/>
</g>

<!-- 104 -->
<g id="node139" class="node">
<title>104</title>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="26502,-1655.5 26502,-1697.5 26874,-1697.5 26874,-1655.5 26502,-1655.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26593.5" y="-1680.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">TURN 104 - STUDENT 10</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26640.5" y="-1665.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000">EXTENSION</text>
<polygon fill="#00b2ee" stroke="transparent" points="26502,-1553.5 26502,-1655.5 26874,-1655.5 26874,-1553.5 26502,-1553.5"/>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26508" y="-1638.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> Not a lot of people can say that they survived the</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26525.5" y="-1623.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> holocaust so if you do still believe in religion</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26520.5" y="-1608.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> then you can have a more stronger future and</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26547.5" y="-1593.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> saying that you survived something so</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26511" y="-1578.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> traumatic that you can live your life the way you</text>
<text text-anchor="start" x="26606.5" y="-1563.3" font-family="Times,serif" font-size="14.00" fill="#000000"> wanted to afterwards.</text>
<polygon fill="#000000" stroke="#000000" points="26501,-1655.5 26501,-1655.5 26875,-1655.5 26875,-1655.5 26501,-1655.5"/>
<polygon fill="none" stroke="#000000" points="26501,-1552.5 26501,-1698.5 26875,-1698.5 26875,-1552.5 26501,-1552.5"/>
</g>
